snippet.title: Cotrio PC launch trailer
snippet.description:
Now available on PC&MAC an award winning puzzler for your pleasure!

(free) Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bkbl.cotrio
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/976360/Cotrio
Itch.io: https://bialek.itch.io/cotrio 
https://itunes.apple.com/pl/app/cotrio/id1217055123

*****


Cotrio is a visually stunning love letter to numbers and fuel that will fire up your imagination.

• Over 80 handcrafted puzzles
• Thirty poetic 3D worlds to move your imagination
• Meticulous design & minimal aesthetics for a pleasant experience
• Meditative, original soundtrack
• Two gameplay modes – more casual or challenging
• Translated to 8 languages
• Photo mode – memorise your favourite moments
• Night mode – play anytime
• All the art, code, soundscapes are made by solo developer over period of 2 years.

Experience hours of number-crunching fun or immerse yourself in myriads of poetic animated worlds

*****

© BKBL Bartosz Białek, 2019
